title: Upgraded FanDuel promo code: Get a $300 bonus for Yankees, Phillies, more MLB betting
description: The new FanDuel welcome offer gives users a shot at earning $300 in bonus bets.
content:
Philadelphia Phillies' Kyle Schwarber hits a three-run home run during the eighth inning of a baseball game against the San Francisco Giants in San Francisco, Wednesday, July 9, 2025. AP Photo/Jeff Chiu

You don’t need a FanDuel promo code to claim a new welcome offer from the nation’s most popular sportsbook. If you bet $5 on any MLB game and win, FanDuel loads your account with $300 in bonus bets.

Continue reading to learn more about one of the best NJ sportsbook promos.

FanDuel promo code: How to claim a $300 bonus for MLB betting tonight

Your initial $5 wager with FanDuel Sportsbook must win to receive the $300 bonus. This is a bit of a hurdle, but there are no odds limits on your bet, meaning you can back a market with extremely short odds for a better shot at victory.

Here’s how to sign up:
• None Select your state and provide the necessary information; no promo code is required.
• None Choose a payment method and deposit at least $5.
• None Bet $5 on MLB or any other market available at FanDuel.
• None Get $300 in bonuses if your bet settles as a winner.

If your qualifying wager wins, the $300 bonus arrives within 72 hours of bet settlement. Bonuses are non-withdrawable and expire seven days after receipt.

The $300 bonus can be split into any increment you prefer. For example, you could place three $100 bonus bets or 30 $10 bonus bets.

RELATED: Review the latest 2025 World Series odds for the Phillies, Yankees and Mets.

The $300 bonus expires after a week, but you can always check the FanDuel app to find more top-notch existing user promos. These are a few of the offers you can claim today:
• None Parlay Profit Boost: Place a 3+ leg parlay or same-game parlay and increase the potential winnings by 25%. This promo can be used on any sport.
• None Refer-A-Friend: If a friend joins FanDuel using your unique referral link, you’ll score two 100% profit boosts that double your payout.

How to use the FanDuel promo code for Phillies vs. Reds & Twins vs. Yankees

Best bet: Will Warren to record 3+ strikeouts (-2000 odds at FanDuel)

There’s no consolation prize if your initial $5 bet loses, so your main focus should be finding a wager with safe odds. The payout won’t be much to brag about, but you can chase higher payouts after the $300 bonus is secured.

My best bet is Yankees’ starter Will Warren to notch at least three strikeouts. The odds are -2000, and the implied probability is 95.24%.

Warren averages roughly 5.5 strikeouts per game and has tallied 3+ strikeouts in 21 of 24 appearances this season. If he meets his average tonight against the Twins, you’ll enjoy a $300 bonus.

If you’re more interested in betting on Phillies vs. Reds, consider taking Philadelphia’s alternate run total of 1.5 (-1100 odds) or Cincinnati starter Andrew Abbott to record 3+ strikeouts (-1600 odds).

Those who aren’t into sports betting can also get in on the action with FanDuel. No FanDuel Casino promo code is required to claim a beginner-friendly sign-up bonus.

Start by registering a new account and submitting a deposit of $10 or more. Once the deposit processes, you’ll receive 500 bonus spins and a $40 bonus. It’s not the flashiest online casino welcome offer, but it serves as a great way to test FanDuel Casino’s game catalog without risking real money.
summary: FanDuel, the nation's most popular sportsbook, has upgraded its offer to offer a $300 bonus for MLB betting. If you bet $5 on any MLB game and win, FanDuel will load your account with $300 in bonus bets. The bonus can be split into any increment, such as three $100 bonus bets or 30 $10 bonus bets, depending on the winning wager. The bonuses are non-withdrawable and expire seven days after receipt. The promotion can be used on any sports, with best bet being Yankees starter Will Warren to record 3+ strikeouts in a game against the Twins. Additional offers include a parlay profit boost, referral-a-friend referrals, and a 500 bonus spins and a $40 bonus.
shortSummary: FanDuel offers enhanced bonuses for winning MLB games and other bets, including $300 in bonus bets if you deposit at least $5.

FanDuel was among the first companies to launch a legal US online sportsbook after PASPA was removed in 2018.
The esteemed sportsbook has grown exponentially since its inception and will continue to do so as online sports betting becomes legal in more states.
For now, sports betting fans in 23 states have access to FanDuel Sportsbook. That includes some of the country’s true sports hubs, such as Massachusetts, New York, and New Jersey.
In this FanDuel Sportsbook review, I thoroughly examine what this platform has to offer. This includes information on its various bonuses, betting markets, banking options, and more.
See why FanDuel is widely considered one of the top NJ sportsbooks.
Pros and cons
| Pros | Cons |
|---|---|
| User-friendly interface | No phone number for customer service |
| Excellent live betting options | Somewhat limited promotions for existing users |
| Secure banking transactions |
Bonuses and promotions
FanDuel’s bonuses are among the best in the industry. New and existing players have access to fantastic offers, all of which can be claimed in just a few minutes.
The FanDuel Sportsbook promo code (no promo code needed) offer allows players to earn $150 in bonus bets when their first bet wins. It’s not necessarily the largest welcome bonus available to claim today, yet it’s certainly one of the easiest to earn.
Here are the steps to claim this bonus today:
- Locate and click on any FanDuel banner with the words “Get Bonus” that are on this page. You will be redirected to FanDuel’s homepage. No promo code is required, so you won’t need to copy anything before leaving this page.
- Register for a FanDuel account by clicking the “Join Now” button and inputting required personal information.
- Deposit at least $5 into the new account, using any approved banking option, to trigger the next step of the promotion.
- Bet $5 on any FanDuel market, including football, basketball, baseball, hockey, soccer, rugby, and more.
- If that initial, promotion-qualifying $5 wager wins, FanDuel will credit the account with $150 in bonus bets within 72 hours of settlement.
There are a variety of bonuses for existing players, too. Some of these bonuses include:
- Profit boosts: Earn profit boosts for various sporting events taking place throughout the year.
- Odds boosts: For specific bets during marquee events, FanDuel will roll out odds boosts.
- Refer-a-friend bonus: FanDuel Sportsbook provides its players with $50 in bonus bets for each friend they refer.
- No sweat bets: Get your stake back as a bonus bet if you lose a wager when FanDuel advertises a no-sweat bet promotion.
FanDuel Sportsbook constantly updates its list of promotions. Many of these focus on specific seasons of major sports leagues (NFL, NBA, MLB).
Like many other experts, I feel that FanDuel’s promotions are some of the best provided by any US online sportsbook. They are always easy to claim and come with fair terms and conditions.
Additionally, the frequency in which these promotions are offered is appealing, as existing users can undoubtedly find some promo or bonus daily.
User experience and interface
FanDuel’s design and UX are widely considered to be among the best in the market. It has a sleek blue-and-white theme that looks fantastic using both a desktop computer and a smartphone.
The odds are categorized extremely efficiently, too. On a desktop, the list of sports odds can be found on the left side of the home screen. Using the FanDuel mobile app, sports odds are located horizontally near the top of the homepage. Click any of these sports to find sub-categories of individual sports leagues.
I also love some of the unique features that FanDuel incorporates into its design. For example, on the homepage, players will find a list of Popular Same-Game Parlays that allow users to quickly create potentially lucrative parlays on upcoming sporting events.
Mobile bettors can access FanDuel Sportsbook using their phone’s web browser and the dedicated mobile app. This app can be easily downloaded via the Apple Store and Google Play Store.
Betting markets and options
FanDuel Sportsbook’s list of betting markets is extensive. As one would expect, it provides odds on all major US sports leagues, including the NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, and MLS. Members will also find odds on sports more popular internationally, such as cricket, Jai Alai, and rugby.
The full list of sports that FanDuel Sportsbook provides odds on includes:
- Aussie Rules
- Baseball
- Basketball
- Boxing
- Cricket

- Darts
- Football

- Soccer
- Table Tennis
- Tennis
- Volleyball
I found that nearly every type of bet imaginable can be made at FanDuel Sportsbook. With a click of a button, players can make moneyline, totals, point spreads, and parlay bets.
It’s also incredible to see how many different prop wagers are offered here. Some of the prop options for standard NBA games, for example, include the First Basket scorer, Total Rebounds, and individual Total Quarter Points.
The live wagering options at FanDuel are world-class. Members can access live odds on sports leagues around the world 24/7.
With FanDuel TV+, players can also watch a variety of live sporting events, unique sports coverage, and live horse racing.
Another fantastic feature here is the ability to claim early cash-outs on your wagers. If players appear to be winning their wagers, FanDuel offers its members the option to claim winnings before the bet has even been settled.
I cannot recall an online sportsbook that provides as many unique wagering options as FanDuel Sportsbook. There is no doubt this is a key reason why this platform is one of the most popular betting platforms in the country.
Banking options at FanDuel Sportsbook
The banking system set in place at FanDuel Sportsbook is superb. Players have access to a great selection of ways to make deposits and withdrawals.
Deposit options
Depositing at FanDuel is simple. Members have access to 11 deposit options, each with instant processing times and zero fees.
Here are the current deposit options available:
- Online banking via Trustly
- Debit Cards: Visa, MasterCard
- Apple Pay
- Venmo
- PayPal
- Credit Cards: Visa, MasterCard
- Cash at Counter
- PayNearMe
- Wire Transfer
- FanDuel Prepaid Play+ Card
- Gift Card
Withdrawal options
Making withdrawals at FanDuel is also simple. Payouts are processed very quickly and have zero fees.
The current withdrawal options at FanDuel Sportsbook include:
- Online banking with Trustly - 3 to 5 business days
- Debit Cards: Visa, MasterCard - Up to 24 hours
- Venmo - Up to 24 hours
- PayPal - Up to 24 hours
- FanDuel Prepaid Play+ Card - Up to 24 hours
- Check - 7 to 10 business days
- Cash at Counter - 1 hour to 48 hours
FanDuel takes its security extremely seriously. This platform has taken several steps to ensure that its players’ privacy and funds are always protected.
The FanDuel Sportsbook platform is completely SSL encrypted. It also offers two-factor authentication for players to better protect their accounts.
Various other security measures are set in place, including KYC verifications, fraud monitoring, and ensuring that all government regulations are being followed.
FanDuel Sportsbook customer support
Players at FanDuel Sportsbook are given access to several forms of customer support. This includes:
- Live chat
- Email support
- Social media support (X and Facebook)
- FAQ page
Unfortunately, FanDuel Sportsbook does not currently provide phone line support.
However, I did not find this to be a major disadvantage, as the live chat feature allows players to speak directly with company representatives.
The support system that is set in place works well. I tested the live chat system and found it to be helpful. Before being connected with a human agent, members will need to explain their questions to an AI chatbot. Once the AI system has a better idea of your issue, it will connect you with the best possible agent.
Email support is said to take between 1-2 days for replies. Some players have claimed to receive a response in just a few hours. Others have stated that it took several days to receive a response.
This likely depends on how busy FanDuel is and what exactly your question is about.
The majority of members have praised the support system at FanDuel Sportsbook. Some, however, have understandably complained about the lack of phone support.
FanDuel tends to listen to its users, and it’s reasonable to assume that phone line support will become available in the future.
Legal and regulatory compliance
The US sports betting industry is closely monitored. For online sportsbooks to operate legally, they must undergo a detailed process to ensure they abide by all legal state and federal regulations.
FanDuel is one of the industry’s biggest and most established online gambling brands. It should come as no surprise that this online sportsbook holds valid gaming licenses in each of the states in which it operates.
Responsible gambling measures
Another key component of legal online sportsbooks is providing players with a variety of responsible gaming measures. Some of the responsible gambling measures set in place include:
- Self-limiting services: FanDuel Sportsbook makes it easy for all members to set limits on their deposits, wagering amounts, and playing time. This tool helps bettors better regulate their gambling activities.
- My Spend feature: Not long ago, FanDuel Sportsbook launched a “My Spend” feature. This state-of-the-art tool allows players to track exactly how much they are wagering over time. It can help players better manage their budgets and set clear limits in the future.
- Self-Exclusion: Players can also choose to completely self-exclude from betting. Anyone who feels that their betting habit is getting out of control can activate this feature and remove themselves from the FanDuel betting market completely.
- Betting education: FanDuel Sportsbook also provides various educational information on sports betting and its potential drawbacks. This includes hotlines and contact information for services that can help players with sports betting addiction issues.
Conclusion
FanDuel Sportsbook certainly deserves its status as one of the country’s best, most respected online sportsbooks. It does nearly everything right, with a world-class design, a massive selection of betting markets, and a comprehensive banking system that caters to almost everyone.
I am truly impressed with the sheer variety of betting markets. Few other online sportsbooks offer as many bet types as FanDuel. I also love some of the more unique features available, such as the ability to create same-game parlays and claim early winnings on wagers that have not been settled.
FanDuel’s design is also worth highlighting. Perhaps no other online sportsbook has as smooth and user-friendly a design as this platform. Navigating the betting platform is simple, using all types of devices, and customer support is always available to ensure players can find help when they need it.
With that being said, FanDuel could improve its support by offering a phone line system. Not everyone has the time to sit on their devices and respond to messages. Giving players phone support could certainly be beneficial to help certain players.
Overall, FanDuel is one of the country’s best online sportsbooks. It’s constantly evolving, too, meaning players will likely gain access to new and exciting features over the next few years.

How World Series betting odds work
World Series odds are futures bets, which means you can make them at any point either before or after the season has started. The odds are going to fluctuate based on what each team is doing on the field.
For instance, last season the Yankees odds to win the 2024 World Series were at +900 at BetMGM at the start of the season and moved to +650 on May 1 after a hot start.
When the Yankees were slumping last May and June their odds were +650, then fell to +400 as the postseason began. In the example above, a $100 bet would have returned $400 if the New York Yankees had won the 2024 World Series.
These bets have good return on investment because there is a lot of volatility involved (along with the fact you are tying up money for at least six months). The downside of World Series odds betting is you are stuck at one price.
You could put $20 on a team at +500 odds, only for their odds to be +800 a few months later. It’s a long season. You might like them still at +800, but if you cash out your previous future you’re not going to get your entire stake.
The sportsbooks offer cash-outs as percentages of your potential payout in order to limit their liability in the event your future bet actually does cash.
You’ll mostly always see “plus odds” offered by sportsbooks when it comes to World Series betting odds. There’s too much variability for any sane bettor to wager hard-earned money on a -300 World Series odds favorite ($300 bet returns $100) in April, and bookmakers know this.
World Series futures betting explained
Futures betting isn’t for everyone. That’s the first thing to know if you’re new to sports betting. The odds look appealing because as I mentioned earlier, you’re always going to get “plus odds” in the World Series odds betting market.
It’s easy to see +900 and think, $100 to win $900 would be great. But a +900 underdog has 10% implied probability, which means it has a 10% chance of cashing.
I suggest always plugging your odds into an implied probability calculator to get a better understanding of the reality attached to those odds.
I bet futures quite a bit because they’re fun. Plus, it gives you something to follow for an entire season. It’s also an investment, in a way.
You may not have believed the Mets would win the 2024 World Series. But if you grabbed them at +1500 at the start of the postseason and they won it all, you would have been looking at a nice return-on-investment.
The tricky part with World Series odds betting is that it’s at the sportsbooks discretion as to if, and when, a cash-out is available.
The other part of wagering on World Series betting odds is timing. You’re always going to get the greatest odds on favorites before the season starts. That’s the risk you inherit if you instead make a MLB futures wager in June.
The Dodgers were at +800 when the 2024 World Series betting lines opened at BetMGM on November 1, 2023. They were at -425 before they closed out the series against the Yankees.
I like to make MLB World Series futures wagers at the start of the season, and then around the quarter-pole mark. Memorial Day is always a benchmark in terms of the baseball season.
Make a note of the odds you like before Opening Day, then compare them to the World Series odds on Memorial Day. That’s a good way to power rate and find value in favorites that get off to a slow start, or dark horses you think have staying power.

Types of NJ Sportsbook promos
Bet-and-get offers are the most common welcome promo at New Jersey betting sites because they’re an ideal option for first-time bettors.
You must only meet the minimum wagering requirement (typically $5), and a bonus will hit your account. Some sportsbooks only send the bonus if your bet wins, so it’s important to know the terms and conditions before claiming a bet-and-get offer.
No-sweat bets, also known as first-bet insurance or a first-bet safety net, are another great choice for new bettors. If your opening wager loses, you’ll get a bonus equal to the stake.
Sportsbooks will only refund your losses up to a certain amount, and some also enforce odds restrictions that must be satisfied to remain eligible. You won’t receive a bonus if your first bet wins because you’ll instead get a cash payout, which is much more valuable.
Unlike other popular NJ sportsbook promos, deposit match offers don’t rely on the outcome of your initial wager. Instead, these promos allow you to earn a bonus equal to your first deposit.
For example, a $150 deposit would land you $150 in bonuses. Sportsbooks occasionally match your deposit up to a certain percentage, meaning the bonus won’t be equal to the amount you deposit.
How to maximize NJ Sportsbook promos
Before you rush to make your first bet and secure a bonus, it’s wise to take some time and consider how you can get the most out of a sign-up offer.
Bet-and-get promos that don’t require a winning wager can be maximized by betting on a market with long-shot odds or a multi-leg parlay with a big payout. The bonus is coming no matter the result of your bet, so why not swing for the fences?
However, some sportsbooks only send a bonus if your bet wins, and those offers should be handled more carefully by backing a market with extremely short odds. You won’t get a flashy cash payout if you win, but it’s best to play it as safe as possible.
First-bet insurance also provides an opportunity to bet an underdog or parlay and score a hefty payout.
The welcome offer only kicks in if your bet loses, so you can feel a sense of security knowing you won’t be left empty-handed if the wager doesn’t hit.
What you can and can’t bet on in NJ
Garden State residents will be happy to know that New Jersey betting sites offer wagering on a wide variety of sports leagues and events.
These include daily matchups in each of the four major pro sports, prop betting, and futures markets like World Series odds or Super Bowl odds. Sportsbooks also accept action on niche markets, like cricket, darts, World Series odds, Super Bowl odds, and lacrosse.
Betting on college sports is another option but with one major caveat. New Jersey betting sites don’t accept wagers on collegiate sporting events that take place within state lines, or games that involve in-state schools.
